summary: This is a simple mod that allows you to change the way Sofia looks. Just download the version you want and follow an easy installer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img902/6881/c22210.png[/img][/center]
[center][color=#6aa84f][size=5][b][i]I Would love it if some users could upload some screenshots ^_^[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]

[color=yellow][size=4]ADEC, CHSBHC, CNHF, ALSL, Pandora, Dreamgirl and Rebirth versions will no longer recieve updates because there is not much content I can add to them. Unless someone can point me to something useful for those bodies they will only be updated when I add more eyes or teeth.[/size][/color]

[color=red][size=3]You [b]WILL[/b] need the original mod! Find it here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?] Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower[/url][/size][/color]

This mod allows you to change the way Sofia looks. You can change the body textures, teeth, face and eyes. If you want to change her hair I recommend one of these mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43673/?] Apachii Wigs[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?] The Hairstyler[/url]

This mod will work with both the BSA and Loose Files version of Sofia by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3679820/?] djjohnjarvis[/url]. Download the mod with NMM to use the XML installer!

[color=#0B8DB3][size=4]Video[/size][/color]

Sofia Customizer appears in these videos


[youtube]xtL3Dx-xKUQ[/youtube] [youtube]LeOvi7B_8L4[/youtube]



[color=#0B8DB3][size=4]Updating[/size][/color]

When you are updating Sofia be sure too deactivate this mod before updating Sofia. After Sofia is updated run the installer again.

[size=4][color=red]Anything you would like to see? Send me a message or leave a comment![/color][/size]

Any user-submitted screenshots are welcomed!

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the nif files to [i]data\meshes\actor\character\sofia[/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i]data\textures\actor\character\sofia[/i]. The eyes goes into the sofia\eyes folder.

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=4]Body/Face Texture[/size][/color]

author: Adrianus92

files.name: Sofia Customizer - ADEC - 2.8
files.changelogHtml:
Completly removed HDT
New images for every option
New eye reflection
More Eye Options
Optimized the installer script
Mature BETA Options should now work on SeveNBase version
